手动识别: Shown when landed and help is needed on foot To manually identify:
1. 走到任意停机坪的中心并蹲下 Shown when landed and help is needed on foot 1. Walk to the center of any landing pad and crouch
2. 将左脚放在中心凹槽上 Shown when landed and help is needed on foot 2. Place your left foot over the the center grooves
3. 面朝前方，使箭头标志位于你的左侧 Shown when landed and help is needed on foot 3. Face with the chevrons ahead to your left
4. 瞄准前方凹槽的末端 Shown when landed and help is needed on foot 4. Aim at the end of the groove ahead of you
5. 发送消息 '{0}'
Shown when landed and help is needed on foot {0} string, the non-localized command to type 5. Send message '{0}'
